title: Merz says German economy shows signs of a turnaround but IMF flags medium-term risks
description:
German Chancellor Friedrich Merz on Wednesday said there were signs the economy is turning a corner following his landmark reform of fiscal rules earlier this year, but the International Monetary Fund warned mediumterm prospects remain constrained.

title: German inflation holds at 2.3 pct in November
description:
BERLIN, Nov. 28 (Xinhua) -- Germany's inflation rate held steady at 2.3 percent in November, still above the European Central Bank's target of 2 percent, preliminary data from the Federal Statistical Office (Destatis) showed on Friday.

title: Roundup: Germany sees modest labor market relief, but factory layoffs, weak demand drag on
description:
BERLIN, Nov. 28 (Xinhua) -- Germany's labor market showed slight improvement in November after recent months of elevated unemployment, even as companies continued to plan job cuts. Europe's largest economy is seeing its sharpest job losses in key manufacturing industries in a decade.
